bs-extendedsearch-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of extended search extension.
specialextendedsearch:
Special page name for extended search
{{Identical|Extended search}}
prefs-extendedsearch:
Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], headline for extended search section in preferences.
{{Identical|Extended search}}
bs-extendedsearch-category-filter:
Text for {{PLURAL:$1|Category|Categories}}: $2
* $1 - the number of categories - use for PLURAL distinction
* $2 - a comma separated list of categories
{{Identical|Category}}
bs-extendedsearch-curl-not-active:
Text for the cURL extension is not activated.
* "cUrl" is a PHP extension
bs-extendedsearch-files:
Checkbox label for search files
{{Identical|Search file}}
bs-extendedsearch-file-protocol-not-acti: Text for for indexing linked files in wiki pages the "file" protocol has to be activated inside your wiki. Further information can be found here https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Manual:$wgUrlProtocols.
bs-extendedsearch-fuzzy:
An exact search for "$1" found no results. There {{PLURAL:$2|is $2 similar result|are $2 similar results}}.

$1 is the search term in bold, $2 is the number of similar results found - use for PLURAL distinction
bs-extendedsearch-indexing-files-in-repo:
Text for indexing uploaded files
It is shown in the log file while index is being created
No punctuation needed
bs-extendedsearch-indexing-external-file:
Text for indexing external files
It is shown in the log file while index is being created
No punctuation needed
bs-extendedsearch-indexing-linked-files:
Text for indexing linked files
It is shown in the log file of ExtendedSearch while index is being created
No punctuation needed
bs-extendedsearch-indexing-wiki-articles:
Text for indexing wiki pages
It is shown in the log file while index is being created
No punctuation needed
bs-extendedsearch-indexing-specialpages:
Text for indexing special pages
It is shown in the log file while index is being created
No punctuation needed
bs-extendedsearch-invalid-query: Text for the query could not be processed.
bs-extendedsearch-nosearchterm: Text for please enter a search term.
bs-extendedsearch-result:
Search for "$1" found $2 {{PLURAL:$2|result|results}}.

$1 is the search term in bold, $2 is the number of results found
bs-extendedsearch-result-caption:
Text for $1 - $2 out of $3 results. Parameters: 
* $1 - the start of shown result range
* $2 - the end of shown result range
* $3 - the total number of results found - use for PLURAL distinction
bs-extendedsearch-search-category: Text for search in the categories:
bs-extendedsearch-search-help-multiselec: Text for hold CTRL key to select multiple items.
bs-extendedsearch-search-namespace: Text for search in the namespaces:
bs-extendedsearch-server-not-available: Text for the search server is not available.
bs-extendedsearch-specialpage-form-retur: Anchor text for basic search form
bs-extendedsearch-specialpage-form-expan: Anchor text for extended search form
bs-extendedsearch-pref-searchfiles: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label text for search files by default
bs-extendedsearch-pref-defscopeuser: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label text for default for search:
bs-extendedsearch-pref-scope-text: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label text for full text
bs-extendedsearch-pref-scope-title:
Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label text for title
{{Identical|Title}}
bs-extendedsearch-pref-jumptotitle: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label text for redirect to page if exists
bs-extendedsearch-pref-indextylinked: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label text for index files that are linked in wiki pages
bs-extendedsearch-pref-indextypesrepo: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label text for index uploaded files
bs-extendedsearch-pref-indextypeswiki: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label text for index wiki pages
bs-extendedsearch-pref-indextypesspecial: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label text for index wiki special pages
bs-extendedsearch-pref-limitresultdef: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label text for number of results on special page:
bs-extendedsearch-pref-showcreatesugg: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label text for show create and suggest links on special page
bs-extendedsearch-pref-showfacets: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label text for show facets on special page
bs-extendedsearch-pref-showautocomplete: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label text for show autocomplete menu
bs-extendedsearch-pref-externalrepo: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label text for index external directory:
bs-extendedsearch-pref-acentries: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label text for number of results in autocomplete:
bs-extendedsearch-pref-highlightsnippets: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label text for number of highlight snippets:
bs-extendedsearch-pref-indexfiletypes: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label text for file extensions to be indexed:
bs-extendedsearch-pref-logging: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label text for statistical evaluation of search queries
bs-extendedsearch-pref-logusers: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label text for log username with search queries
bs-extendedsearch-pref-solrpingtime: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label text for ping time (in seconds):
bs-extendedsearch-pref-showcresuginac: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label text for show create and suggest links in autocomplete
bs-extendedsearch-pref-solrserviceurl: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label text for solr URL:
bs-extendedsearch-pref-setfocus: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label text for automatically focus search form (pages only)
bs-extendedsearch-pref-numfacets: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label text for number of facets on special page:
bs-extendedsearch-pref-showmlt: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label text for show similar pages
bs-extendedsearch-pref-solrcore: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label text for solr core instance:
bs-extendedsearch-pref-mltns:
Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label text.

Refers to {{msg-mw|Bs-extendedsearch-morelikethis}}.
bs-extendedsearch-index-successfully-del: Text for the index was deleted.
bs-extendedsearchadmin-label:
Anchor text for search options.
{{Identical|Search options}}
bs-extendedsearch-index-error-deleting:
Text for error while deleting index: $1

$1 is the error message
bs-extendedsearch-no-success-deleting:
Text for exception thrown while deleting index: $1

$1 is the exception message
bs-extendedsearch-indexinginprogress: Text for the index is being created at the moment.
bs-extendedsearch-delete-lock: Anchor text for delete lock file
bs-extendedsearch-lockfiletext: Text for please, only delete the lock file if you are sure indexing is not in progress.
bs-extendedsearch-did-you-mean: Text for did you mean "$1"? $1 is a comma separated list of proposals
bs-extendedsearch-recentsearchterms:
Headline for recent search terms
{{Identical|Recent search terms}}
bs-extendedsearch-recentsearchtermsdesc: Text for list of the most recent searched terms inside this Wiki sorted by their count.
bs-extendedsearch-no-mlt-found: Text for no similar pages found.
bs-extendedsearch-redirect:
Text for redirect from: $1 

* $1 is a comma separated list of redirects
bs-extendedsearch-totalnoofarticles:
Text for number of pages to index: $1 

* $1 is the total number of pages
